author: mrglavas
msg: We're much closer to meeting RFC 2396, though a few other fixes remain.
Support for IPv6 was the largest change.

author: mrglavas
msg: Fixing #18597, AIOOBE thrown for invalid char refs of the form &#; &#x; &#2147483648 (and every other 'codepoint' > 2^31-1).

author: neilg
msg: as made clear by Xalan bug #21300, we should recognize the KS_C_5601-1987 encoding.  This is now fixed.

author: mrglavas
msg: Fixing bug in HTML DOM (http://nagoya.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=18744). Deletion of rows other than row 0 were failing siliently.
Thanks to Brett Sutton for the fix.

author: mrglavas
msg: Remove extra semicolon to fix GUMP failure.
